TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: Pokeman is nothing more than the glorified gladiator style fighting of enslaved animals.
In chess they train low-level pokemons (so-called "pawkemons", or just "pawns") to upgrade into a pokemon of any higher level.
Pikachu has been in the Pokemon trafficking business the whole time (that is like a human being in the human trafficking business.)
Pikachu is an ugly color

Pikachu is a badly made cheap electric toy, electrocuting everyone who tried to touch it. It's its author childhood horror.

Edited August 13, 2021 by kerbiloid
Pikachu isn't that what people in the US South say? Ah am goan peek achoo
Pikachu is the favourite toy of Chucky. It's real name is Pikachucky.
My kids Mickey mouse doll is scarier than Chucky.

The Tolkienists were whining that there is no Tom Bombadil in the LOTR series.

Now they will get five seasons of that chewing gum to enjoy every once-mentioned insignificant character of the prequel/

As, as it's well-known, "there are no women in the Middle-Earth", every second character and scene will be as close to the original as Hobbit (movie) to Hobbit (book) (ask Tauriel for deyails)
The Sistine chapel ceiling could do with a nice coat of white paint.
Mount Rushmore is just an eyesore ruining natural beauty.
Natural beauty is an eyesore ruining Mount Rushmore and McDonalds car parks.
The so-called "growling" is a noise-instead-of-voice mask for absence of vocal talent.
When does the Mary vs Megan vs Kate Princess Rap battle start?
It would be better if the Starship first stage fails, as otherwise its second stage will burn.
Star Trek Discovery is far better than Star Wars Rebels.
The Robocop's combat tactics is even more stupid than the Terminator's one.
I liked the remake better.
The remakes are always better. Take the Charmed, for example.

Both starbucks and in-n-out are over priced and over hyped mediocrity.

012708182021
What is a Starbucks?
That coffee dealer from the last season of The Game Of Throngs.
Game of Thrones.... Isn't that some new card game?

47 minutes ago, Dientus said:

Game of Thrones.... Isn't that some new card game?

No. It's two toilet seats per twenty kids.
Isn't the show The Walking Dead about people who weren't able to drink coffee for a week?
